artist: Lithographer: Gustav Wolff; Painter: After Dosso Dossi
description: Immaculate Conception and Doctors of the Church; in the upper section tne Virgin is kneeling before God on a cloud with angels and cherubim around them; lower section the Latin Fathers of the Church, Sts. Gregory, Ambrose and Augustine at the right and St. Jerome and a monk at the left
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

on sheet in black: [Gemalt am Dosso Dossi   Lithogr. von G. Wolff/ DIE VIER KIRCHENVÄTER/ (Dresdener Galerie)/ 48]; in pencil on sheet: [1-359]
title: Die Vier Kirchenväter
